alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 8:57AM CDT until June 20 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Nebraska... South Platte River near Roscoe affecting Keith County. .Runoff from rainfall in Colorado has led to elevated river levels along the South Platte River in southwestern Nebraska. River levels will remain above minor flood stage through this evening. For the South Platte River...including Roscoe...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Platte River near Roscoe. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood Stage. Minor flooding of agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM MDT Monday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 AM MDT Monday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.4 feet on 06/16/1997. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM MDT.
